Class CategoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.CategoryController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class CategoryController
extends play.mvc.Controller
    Class CategoryController is out controller through which we control all the actions and function concerning the Categories of our products

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static play.mvc.Result addMainCategory()
      Method addMainCategory adds new category into the list and also in the database and it will also check if that name is taken;
      static play.mvc.Result addSubCategory(int id)
      Method addSubCategory adds new sub category into the list and also in the database and it will also check if that name is taken
      static play.mvc.Result allCategory()
      Method allCategory list all of present categories at single view
      static play.mvc.Result categories(int id)
      Method categories finds all entries in database in table Main_Category and collects them and sends them to the view which will represent them correctly Renders the folowing parameters : productsList - which are all the products which are not sold and not special (not distinguished products) and are from the main Category by the id received; specialProductList - all the products that are not sold and are made special (are distinguished products) and are from the main Category by the id received; mainCategoryList - the list of our categories; mc - the main category clicked on, which we have found by the id received as the parameters;
      static play.mvc.Result deleteMainCategory(int id)
      Method deleteMainCategory deletes gives category from the views and the database The deleteCategory does not delete the products deleted in that category, it transfers all the products that are in the category about to be deleted to the categroy "Ostalo";
      static play.mvc.Result deleteSubCategory(int id)
      Method deleteSubCategory deletes gives sub category from the views and the database The deleteSubCategory does not delete the products deleted in that subcategory, it transfers all the products that are in the subcategory about to be deleted to the subcategroy "Ostalo";
      static play.mvc.Result editMainCategory(int id)
      Method editMainCategory allows administrator to edit one of the category
      static play.mvc.Result editSubCategory(int id)
      Method editSubCategory allows administrator to edit one of the Sub categories
      static play.mvc.Result saveEditMainCategory(int id)
      Method saveEditMainCategory allows administrator to save changes made to category in to the database
      static play.mvc.Result saveEditSubCategory(int id)
      Method saveEditSubCategory allows administrator to save changes made to Sub Category
      static play.mvc.Result subCategories(int id)
      Method subCategories list all Sub Categories of given Main Category The method receives the id under which the MainCategory can be found;
      static play.mvc.Result subCategoriesView(int id)
      Method subCategoriesView finds all entries in database which are members of given Sub Category and sends them to view to be showed; productsList - which are all the products which are not sold and not special (not distinguished products) and are from the sub Category by the id received; specialProductList - all the products that are not sold and are made special (are distinguished products) and are from the sub Category by the id received; mainCategoryList - the list of our categories;

    • Method Detail

      • categories

        public static play.mvc.Result categories(int id)
        Method categories finds all entries in database in table Main_Category and collects them and sends them to the view which will represent them correctly Renders the folowing parameters : productsList - which are all the products which are not sold and not special (not distinguished products) and are from the main Category by the id received; specialProductList - all the products that are not sold and are made special (are distinguished products) and are from the main Category by the id received; mainCategoryList - the list of our categories; mc - the main category clicked on, which we have found by the id received as the parameters;
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        Result rendering the kategorija page;

      • subCategoriesView

        public static play.mvc.Result subCategoriesView(int id)
        Method subCategoriesView finds all entries in database which are members of given Sub Category and sends them to view to be showed; productsList - which are all the products which are not sold and not special (not distinguished products) and are from the sub Category by the id received; specialProductList - all the products that are not sold and are made special (are distinguished products) and are from the sub Category by the id received; mainCategoryList - the list of our categories;
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        Result rendering the podKategorija page;

      • allCategory

        public static play.mvc.Result allCategory()
        Method allCategory list all of present categories at single view
        Returns:
        Result renders the listaKategorija page;

      • subCategories

        public static play.mvc.Result subCategories(int id)
        Method subCategories list all Sub Categories of given Main Category The method receives the id under which the MainCategory can be found;
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        Result render the listPodKategorija page;

        Returns:

      • deleteMainCategory

        public static play.mvc.Result deleteMainCategory(int id)
        Method deleteMainCategory deletes gives category from the views and the database The deleteCategory does not delete the products deleted in that category, it transfers all the products that are in the category about to be deleted to the categroy "Ostalo";
        Parameters:
        id - = id of category which was deleted
        Returns:
        page that lists all of the categories;

      • deleteSubCategory

        public static play.mvc.Result deleteSubCategory(int id)

        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        page that lists all of the subcategories;

      • addMainCategory

        public static play.mvc.Result addMainCategory()

        to the view of all categories with new list shown
